Build a formula for table1::table1()

Source: R/stratified_formula.R
stratified_formula.Rd

Build a formula for table1::table1()

Usage

stratified_formula(vars, strata)

Arguments

vars

row variables

strata

column variables

Value

a formula() object

Examples

stratified_formula(c("Sepal.Length" ,"Sepal.Width"), "Species")
#> ~Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width | Species
#> <environment: 0x55e300154ea0>
